rows.label: qst104706_msg001
rows.name:
The men went to Iyasaki Port for
help but haven't returned... Could
you go and check on them?

rows.label: qst104706_msg101
rows.name: Thank you for saving the men.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0001
rows.name: That was a close call... Thank you.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0002
rows.name: Why did you act on your own?

rows.label: qst104706_msg0003
rows.name:
You're right... Acting without
my Driver was reckless of me.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0004
rows.name:
Byakko-san... Do you ever wish
you were a humanoid Blade?

rows.label: qst104706_msg0005
rows.name: I... What do you mean by that?

rows.label: qst104706_msg0006
rows.name:
If I were humanoid, I
could hold a weapon.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0007
rows.name: I could give first aid to the injured.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0008
rows.name:
Not being able to use
tools... It's frustrating.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0009
rows.name: You are very kind, Enju-san.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0010
rows.name: I had never considered such a thing.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0101
rows.name: What should I say to follow up?

rows.label: qst104706_msg0102
rows.name: We can carry people.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0103
rows.name: We can be a source of comfort.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0201
rows.name:
Indeed, carrying someone
while running is a unique
skill of the beast type.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0202
rows.name:
My Driver is quite large... I
wonder if I could carry him...

rows.label: qst104706_msg0203
rows.name:
My Driver, Nia-ojousama,
says that feeling the wind
as we run is refreshing.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0204
rows.name:
Besides, we are stronger
than humans! A little weight
is no problem for us.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0205
rows.name: ...Heavy?

rows.label: qst104706_msg0206
rows.name:
Ah, no... I did not mean
that Ojousama is heavy!

rows.label: qst104706_msg0301
rows.name:
Indeed, this form allows us to
comfortably stay by their side.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0302
rows.name:
If I were a humanoid male and not
to Nia-ojousama's liking, I would
not be able to act as I do now.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0303
rows.name: That is true.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0304
rows.name:
If I were a humanoid female, my shy
Driver would likely be too embarrassed
to pet me as he does now.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0401
rows.name:
I've reaffirmed the good points of
this form! Thank you, Byakko-san.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0402
rows.name: I am honored to have been of service.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0403
rows.name:
Enju-san, could you and the
others return to the ship?

rows.label: qst104706_msg0404
rows.name: There are injured people, and...

rows.label: qst104706_msg0405
rows.name:
We will inform your Driver
at Yeshiva Harbor for you.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0406
rows.name: But...

rows.label: qst104706_msg0407
rows.name:
Thank you. I will take you
up on your kind offer.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0408
rows.name:
Then, Byakko-san, at the Superbian
military's Torigo Relay Base...

rows.label: qst104706_msg0409
rows.name:
No... actually, could I
trouble you to come directly
to the Superbian Consulate?

rows.label: qst104706_msg0410
rows.name: Yes, understood.

rows.label: qst104706_msg0411
rows.name: Well then...
